article_title: ECB Board Member Yves Mersch Says QE Has Been Successful
article_text:
FRANKFURT—European Central Bank executive board member Yves Mersch said in an interview published Wednesday that the bank’s bond-purchase program has been successful, and that officials are eyeing the impact of lower oil prices on inflation.

“We believe that our program has been successful. After all, we had increasing risks of deflation in Europe,” Mr. Mersch said in an interview with the Asian Banker.

The ECB launched a €60...
